WorkItem.Description:
This is really annoying, I can find no way around this.
 
I have a world drop pve trinket in slot one and a pvp trinket in slot 2.
 
Everytime I optimize rawr replaces the pve trinket with an identical pvp trinket so I end up with 2 of the same pvp trinkets.
 
I do not want 2 of the same pvp trinkets, I want to keep the trinkets I have and just optimize my armor.
WorkItem.Summary: I don't understand why rawr keeps changing my trinket

Comments.Message: If you really don't want two of the same trinket, just edit the trinket and flag it as "Unique".

not a bug



** Closed by Jothay 8/20/2010 8:09 AM

Grr, frustration always solves problems.

I kept looking for the option to make it unique but can never find it. So after your response I moved your application from my right screen to my left on and voile, there it is. I have the same problem with the empty triangles, they just do not show up but I know where they are so have never really bothered with it.

Thanks for the help :D
